name: Apocalypse (itch) (InfernOverdrive)
description:
The World, as we know it is no more

Invading species never seen before now crawl this Earth.

Can you survive, fighting off these species known as zombies, and live?

Play to find out

Controls:

W,A,S,D - movement

Space - Jump

Shift - Sprint

Left click - shoot 

Right click - aim

F - buy

R - reload
